extendedInfo.description: Blu-rayâ¢ just got a whole lot better! Introducing âpocket BLUÂ®â, the perfect utility application to complement your Blu-rayâ¢ movie watching experience.Works with any pocket BLUÂ® enabled Blu-rayâ¢ disc (including Fast Five, Despicable Me, Robin Hood, Get Him to the Greek, Scott Pilgrim vs. The World, Jurassic Park, Bridesmaids, The Office, X-Men, House, Black Swan, and Rio), together with a PS3â¢ or other internet-connected Blu-rayâ¢ player.pocket BLUÂ® works seamlessly with your network connected Blu-rayâ¢ player over Wi-Fi, and offers the following nifty components:â¢	Access exclusive content â Virtual Garage, Behind the Scenes, Scene Explorer, Take Control â on your Android tablet anytime, anywhere! (Note: These features are now available on Fast Five only).â¢	Digital Copies of select movies can be transferred to the pocket BLU deviceÂ® from the Blu-ray disc or internet via a Wi-Fi connection. Please note that Digital Copy is not supported on rooted devices because of security reasons.â¢	Provides optimized layout for Android tablets.â¢	A remote control that operates all on disc features (Playback, Hierarchical menus, Chat, Registration, and Color Key functionalities).â¢	A graphical timeline that appears when the device is held in landscape mode, allowing users to instantly access any point in the movie. For select movie titles, view the chapter thumbnails right on the Timeline. Double click to view more information and access the chapter instantly.â¢	A cross studio content listing of available Blu-rayâ¢ titles where select bonus content (Featurettes, Deleted Scenes, Short Films, etc) can be streamed to the device.â¢	A pop up keyboard that makes all on disc data entry easy and intuitive.â¢	Rate and Post to Facebook: rate the movie or bonus content from pocket BLUÂ®, and add your own personal comment and post it to your Facebook wall to share it with your friends.â¢	Now Playing: for select movies, instantly view information on currently playing chapters.Requirements: OS 1.6+, pocket BLUâ¢ enabled disc, BD-Live enabled Blu-rayâ¢ player, Wi-Fi connection

reviews.title: Its a good start...
reviews.comment: but why so limited on the UltraViolet movie selection?  I\'m still waiting for an app like this that will allow me to store and manage ALL of my UltraViolet movies, not just ones from certain production companies.  An all-in-one app would also need to have a Google TV version of the app as well....it only makes sense.
reviews.author: Kahil Nettleton

reviews.title: What the?
reviews.comment: I was trying to put a movie on my device, but is was hard and i could not do it and it even told me that it works with the app. All it showed when i tapped on it in the store or something was the trailer. >:(  Rip-Off.
reviews.author: Daniel Lopez

reviews.title: Wont download
reviews.comment: My movies won\'t download. It says I don\'t have wireless internet. Well I do. Been trying for months. I\'m done trying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BLU-RAY\'S GREAT BUT THIS SUCKS!
reviews.comment: EVERYTHING about this app is flawed. First, I try to redeem my code by camera, but the app messes with my camera (same with my tablet). Then, I redeem the code by typing it and realize I didn\'t have enough memory. So I get another memory card and try to redeem again but it tells me the code is invalid and now I can\'t get my digital copy! Also, when I go into my library and try to return to the catalog, the catalog never loads. The only thing this app is good for is to be a bluray remote.
reviews.author: Andrew Wheeler

reviews.title: Works but...
reviews.comment: I have a Prometheus DVD marked as Blu ray and UV with digital copy. However, this movie is not listed in this app so I am unable to download it! YIKES!  Can\'t put movies on external SD card. Doesn\'t remember your place in a movie. No fast forward.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: just say PS3 Blue!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Read the fine print...... must have the \"pocket blue enabled PLAYER!\"    This means PS3...........  \"update\" Finally was a able to connect phone and BD Player and downloaded 2 movies, ans shazam it now no longer connects,this app BLOWS, Flixster is more stable than this junk.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confusing but good
reviews.comment: Do some research with this app, this only works for select blueray DVD \'s from universal studios. I would say it\'s a great idea with poor support. If there were more studios backing this it would be awesome but since I have only a few discs this works for it\'s more of a novality.The technical issue with this app is the camera to scan was warped, but it\'s not a big deal as it\'s for the extra content and not to use the remote. Overall it was good just needs more studios backing it to be great.
reviews.author: James Ward

reviews.title: I dig it!
reviews.comment: I saw an ad for this app preceding one of my Blu-ray movies that I had seen several times before. Never saw the ad before, though. I installed it and was immediately thrilled. Why? Because it has the functionality to replace - at least in part - my Blu-ray player\'s remote control. The remote that came with my player has buttons which are difficult to depress enough to have them have an affect on the player. The app\'s remote works far better. That alone is enough to make me give this app a positive rating. I\'m giving it only 4 stars, rather than 5, simply because I\'ve only been able to test it with one movie.
reviews.author: David Dodge

reviews.title: Gimmick
reviews.comment: Another gimmick to try and justify the outrageous cost and low quality of discs and most films as a whole.  Barely works at all, and when it does the interface is so bad that it\'s not exactly convenient to navigate. Digital download doesn\'t work. It used to say it was waiting for wi-fi, but now it doesn\'t say anything at all.  I\'m beginning to understand why some people just download films from the internet. Why pay $25-$30 for all the junk when all I want is to watch a movie?
reviews.author: Justin Thurn

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I probably spent 2 hours of my day trying to get this thing to work. Works perfectly fine at first, but halfway through the movie it freezes and won\'t let me do anything. I try deleting and redownloading, still does the same thing. Then it says there\'s some error. Keeps force closing. Even tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Still doesn\'t work. Really annoying. I finally gave up.>:/
reviews.author: Alora Miller

reviews.title: Worked at first... On a Nexus 7
reviews.comment: After days of trying to get it to work my husband finally did. For one day. Now it says can\'t find digital copy license and I have wasted 3 digital copies. Bummer and VERY frustrating do not waste your time or digital copies.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Awesome but needs more variety in movie companies. It only works with universal for some reason.:O this makes it kinda lame...
reviews.author: Taylor Midgley

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I can\'t get it to pair with the blu-ray player or cpu. Wasted 2 hours of my life.
reviews.author: Paul Parsons

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: The app constantly gets stuck on \"searching\" then when it finally finds the bluray player it force closes. Also when you press the back button the app closes completely. Very annoying inconvenience.
reviews.author: Fabricio Beninkoff

reviews.title: Manoj samsung galaxy note userssss
reviews.comment: Good app but not og blue ray system...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fast Five truble
reviews.comment: I closed the app and now its says \"unfortunately pocketblu is not working\".         Fast five won\'t install after several different attempts. Where is the nexus support? Enjoyed at first with other Movies.
reviews.author: Kyle Perez

reviews.title: Server problems
reviews.comment: Since the day I got this app its told me the server is unavailable. Needs to be fixed. I even tried uninstalling and reinstalling it.
reviews.author: Trent Sagedahl

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: Worked once..now it says please wait..forever apparently...everything else works...this was x-men first class on HTC ReZound ice cream sandwich OS..just want to watch my f ing movie!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Best remote eVeR
reviews.author: joel nutcher-palmer

reviews.title: Suck
reviews.comment: It took over 10 mins and still does not find my ps3
reviews.author: A Google User
